scripts.populate-raw-data: rm -f store/raw-concept-corner.db; sqlite3 store/raw-concept-corner.db '.read store/scripts/create_schema.sql'; sqlite3 store/raw-concept-corner.db '.read store/scripts/populate_raw_data.sql';
scripts.populate-test-data: rm -f store/test-concept-corner.db; sqlite3 store/test-concept-corner.db '.read store/scripts/create_schema.sql'; sqlite3 store/test-concept-corner.db '.read store/scripts/populate_test_data.sql';
scripts.test: export CONCEPT_SECRET_KEY='secretkey'; npm run populate-test-data; export CONCEPT_CORNER_DB='test-concept-corner.db'; nyc mocha --recursive
